code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Row,Col,Button}from'react-bootstrap';import Authuse from'./Auth';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=()=>{const auth=Authuse();const[showCart,setShowCart]=useState(false);const[orderPlaced,setOrderPlaced]=useState(false);const removeFromCart=itemId=>{const updatedCart=auth.price.filter(item=>item.id!==itemId);auth.setprice(updatedCart);};const totalPrice=auth.price.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.price,0);const placeOrder=()=>{setOrderPlaced(true);auth.setprice([]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[showCart&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"mt-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shopping-cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Shopping Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Item"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Action"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:auth.price.map(item=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["$",item.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"cart-buttons",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>removeFromCart(item.id),variant:"danger",children:"Remove"})})]},item.id);})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Total Price: $",totalPrice]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:placeOrder,children:"Place Order"})]})})}),orderPlaced&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"mt-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Thank you for your order!"})})}),auth.price.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.title},item.id))]});};export default Product;
